changelog.notes: Enriched defense prep/defense/post-defense nodes with deadlines, multilingual labels, uploads, and validation without changing categories/IDs.

description.en: If >3 years since graduation, the RP stage is required

question.en: Is the dissertation formatted according to the standard?

en: Compare your manuscript with the official KazNMU formatting standard.
Verify title page, abstracts, table of contents, chapters, conclusion, and references meet the requirements.
Download the standard via the link below.

confirmation_text.en: Confirm the manuscript is fully formatted to the standard?

message.en: Dissertation manuscript is formatted according to the standard.

en: Upload the final manuscript to the KazNMU or Smart-Zhub antiplagiarism system.
Ensure the originality score is 85% or higher.
Download the report and resolve any flagged matches if needed.

description.en: Provide details for each item in Appendix 7. Add publications, conference materials, and intellectual property items for sections I‚ÄìIV. Download the DOCX template from the panel on the right.

label.en: I. Publications indexed in Web of Science or Scopus

help_text.en: Add all publications indexed in international databases

label.en: II. Articles in journals from the KOKSON MSHE RK list

help_text.en: Articles in Kazakh and foreign publications recommended by KOKSON

label.en: III. Scientific works in international conference proceedings and others

help_text.en: Reports, abstracts and papers in conference proceedings

description.en: Confirm the OMiD preliminary review application is prepared and submitted.

question.en: Is the OMiD application prepared and submitted?

en: Download the template and complete the Russian version.
Prepare Kazakh and English versions if required.
Verify all details (name, topic, specialty, contacts).
Submit the application to OMiD via the designated channel and wait for confirmation.

confirmation_text.en: Confirm the OMiD application has been submitted?

message.en: OMiD application confirmed. You can proceed with the SC package.

label.en: Advisor reviews (+ notarized translation if foreign language)
List and copies of publications (per App. 7)
Academic Council extract on topic and advisors
LBC conclusion ‚Äúfor defense‚Äù (email request to lcb@kaznmu.kz with initial conclusion attached)
Schedule and complete the SC hearing. Return to this step afterward.
Are there recorded remarks from reviewers/SC members?

fields.visible_when: form.hearing_happened == true && form.remarks_exist == true && form.plan_prepared != true

label.en: Create a fixes plan first, then return to this step.

fields.visible_when: form.hearing_happened == true && form.remarks_exist == true && form.plan_prepared == true
form.hearing_happened == true && form.remarks_exist == true && form.plan_prepared == true && form.remarks_resolved != true

label.en: Resolve all remarks per the plan, then confirm ‚ÄúYes‚Äù.

actions.visible_when: form.hearing_happened == true && form.remarks_exist == true && form.plan_prepared == true && form.remarks_resolved == true

outcomes.when: (form.remarks_exist == false) || (form.remarks_exist == true && form.plan_prepared == true && form.remarks_resolved == true)
(form.remarks_exist == false) || (form.remarks_exist == true && form.plan_prepared == true && form.remarks_resolved == true)
form.remarks_exist == true && form.plan_prepared == true && form.remarks_resolved != true

description.en: If 3+ years have passed since graduation, defense is allowed only after Research Proposal is re-approved by the Scientific Committee.

label.en: OMiD sends an official letter to the Scientific Committee for your specialty.
The Scientific Committee schedules the hearing date.
The candidate prepares a presentation and a publication list for the hearing.

title.en: SC hearing of the Research Proposal

description.en: Prepare for the hearing: check off the milestones and confirm the protocol extract.

label.en: Publication list prepared (you may use App. 7)
Protocol extract on topic relevance received

title.en: Application to OMiD for preliminary expertise

question.en: Have you submitted the application to OMiD for preliminary expertise at the Scientific Committee?

en: Prepare the application for preliminary expertise (free form or university template).
Attach: presentation, publication list, protocol extract on relevance, recommendations, and details of the assigned reviewers.

confirmation_text.en: Do you confirm the application has been submitted to OMiD?

message.en: Application submitted. Proceed to the pre-defense steps (items 7‚Äì12).

question.en: Have you submitted the letter to the Chair of the Board ‚Äì Rector for permission to defend (Appendix 4)?

en: Download the Appendix 4 template (Russian) and complete the letter.
Include dissertation topic, specialty, and confirmation that DC regulation requirements are satisfied.
Prepare Kazakh and English versions if required by the secretary.
Submit the signed letter to the Council Secretary for registration and forwarding to the Rector.

confirmation_text.en: Are you sure the letter was submitted to the Rector for defence admission?

message.en: The rector letter has been submitted. You can proceed to the next step.

screen.question: Have you received the certificate from NCSTE confirming your publications in indexed international journals?

description.en: Before submitting to the Dissertation Council, the doctoral student must prepare and deliver the complete set of documents to the Council Secretary.

label.en: Domestic & foreign advisor reviews (App. 6, with translation if needed)
SC protocol extract with recommendation for defense
Abstracts in Kazakh, Russian, and English (App. 8)
Academic Council extract confirming topic and advisors
Doctoral candidate‚Äôs reference (department head or employer)
Cover letter (for external applicants, if applicable)

description.en: Reinstatement for defense is required for all doctoral candidates. Prepare and submit the package.

label.en: Receipt for 4 credits (for past cohorts/other universities)

title.en: After DC acceptance ‚Äî what happens next

description.en: Once the Dissertation Council has accepted your documents, an administrative phase begins, carried out by the Council Secretary. Below is an overview of actions, deadlines, and responsible persons.

label.en: üìú Within 5 days, orders appointing temporary members and official reviewers are issued.
‚úâÔ∏è Notification is mailed to the KOKSNVO MSHE RK within 5 days after acceptance.
üåê One month before the defense, the KazNMU website publishes: notice, dissertation PDF, abstracts KZ/RU/EN, publication list, advisor reviews, LBC conclusion, and reviewer reports.
üìÆ Within 10 working days after acceptance, a letter to NCSTE for anti-plagiarism is sent (costs borne by candidate). Letters to temporary members and reviewers are sent 1 month before defense.

title.en: After the defense: what happens next

description.en: After a successful defense, the administrative phase begins, handled by the DC Secretary.

label.en: üìú The Graduate Office prepares the decree to award/deny the PhD degree (based on DC memo and minutes extract).
üåê The KazNMU site posts the full defense video (‚â§5 working days) and the decree (‚â§10 working days).

title.en: Library deposits of print copies (‚â§ 7 working days)

description.en: Mark preparation and delivery of sets to the three libraries. Cover letters are prepared by the DC Secretary (Salem).

label.en: 5 hardbound (sewn) copies of the dissertation prepared
CD with abstracts in 3 languages (3 separate PDF files)
CD in a hard case + insert mirroring the title-page info
Cover letters prepared by DC Secretary via Salem
Set delivered to the National Academic Library RK
Set delivered to the National Library RK
Receipts/confirmations obtained from all three libraries

description.en: Assemble printed and electronic package and submit via the DC Secretary (cover letter via Salem).

label.en: Unbound dissertation in tie folder + candidate‚Äôs signature on title page (1 copy)
Abstracts in 3 languages (1 printed copy per language)
UKD & DEK ‚Äî 2 copies each, double-sided on heavy paper, signed by DC Chair and sealed by KazNMU
Cover letter prepared by DC Secretary in Salem
Package submitted for state registration via DC Secretary to NCSTE
‚ÑπÔ∏è Within 30 days after defense, the attestation file is formed (31 listed items). The university handles this; ensure your documents are available to the secretary.

description.en: Within 30 days after defense, the doctoral attestation file is formed. Check the presence of each document.

label.en: 3) Application to DC for acceptance to defense
